channel.title: NPM on Alpha Coder
channel.description: Recent content in NPM on Alpha Coder

item.title: Understanding modern front-end development
item.description: It can be overwhelming especially for newbies, to work with modern front-end tools as development processes have increased in complexity over the years. As a mostly back-end web developer, I’ve had my share of confusion and frustration trying to wrap my head around how things work. This article hopes to give you a big picture/bird’s eye view of how some of the more common tools used by front-end developers today fit together and the problems they solve/are trying to solve.
